translation: Tohyih chihv aanfals mtʿlq prczhan (aanfal chuh nafluk jmʿ, ʿrby zbạnụ̄ mnz chih nfl tth chyzs vnan yus vạjb ya tamhi khoth hurymanh āshi. Yylhi yih tạbʿ (matḥt) sndi ṭrfh āshi tylhi chuh aamhi nishhi murad so rẓakaranh khdmt āsan yosh akh bndh pnnis mạliks khạṭr frẓ khoth hurymanh pnnhi khvshy bja chuh aanan, mthlaan nfl nmaz, th yylhi yih mtbvʿ (ys aitbaʿ yiyhi krnh) sndi ṭrfh āshi, tylh chuh amhi nishhi murad suh ʿṭyh ya anʿām āsan yus mạlik pnnis bnds chuh tmụ̄ sndi ḥqh khoth hurymanh divan. Yth jayih chuh anfal lfẓ timn mali ghnymtn khạṭr vartavnh āmut yim jngi bdrs mnz mslmann ạsụ̄ ḥạṣl gmtụ̄ th yimn anfal qrar dinuk mṭlb chuh mslmann yih kth dhhn nshyn krnụ̄ zi yih chahnh tuhnz kmạe blkh chuh Allah tʿālyā sund fẓl th anʿām yus tmụ̄ tohyih ʿṭa kvrnv) vniv, yim anfal chih khudays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl sndụ̄, lhādha khvcziv khudays th akh akis sintụ̄ thạviv pnnụ̄ tʿlqat durst, byyhi kriv Allah tʿālyā snz th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl snz aṭaʿt, agr tvhụ̄ mvmn chihv. (yih kth chhe amhi mvjvb frmavnh āmcz zi yih mal bạgravns mtʿlq kanhh ḥukm yinh brvnhh avs mslmanv mnz kynczhv daryv pnnis pnnis ḥqs mtʿlq dʿūyā lvgmut krun)

Pzụ̄ ahli ayman chih tim lukh yihndụ̄ dil Allah tʿālyā snz dhkr bvuzith lrzan chih th yylhi Allah tʿālyā sndụ̄ āyat timn brvnhh knhi prnh chih yivan tylhi chuh tihund ayman huran, timn chuh pnnis rbs pytth aʿtmad āsan.
Yim nmaz chih qạyim kran th yikynczhah ashi timn diytmut chuh tmhi mnz chih (sanhi vathi mnz) khrch kran.
Yithy lukh chih ḥqyqy mvmn, yihndi khạṭr chih yihndis rbs nishhi bddụ̄ drjhi, qṣvrv nishhi chuhkh drgzr byyhi chuhkh bhtryn rzq.
(yth mali ghnymt kis mʿāmls mnz thi chhe ticzhe ṣvurt pysh yivan yczh tmhi vqth pysh ạs āmcz yylhi) tuhndụ̄ rbn ḥq san tvhụ̄ pnnhi gr ạsinv krrimtụ̄, th mvmnv mnz avs akis dris yih nagvar gvmut.
Tim ạsụ̄ ath ḥq kis mʿāmls mnz tohyih sintụ̄ czuvan ḥalankh suh avs ttakarh pạtthụ̄ nvn dramut, tihund ḥal avs yih zanth tim vuchhan ạsụ̄ tim chih mvts kun khrkh vnh yivan.

Yad kriv suh mvqʿ yylhi Allah tʿālyā avs tohyih sintụ̄ vʿdh kran zi doshvyv dryv mnz gczhyv tohyih akh ḥạṣl (yʿny qryshn hund tjarty qạflh yus sham kinụ̄ avs yivan nath qryshn hund lshkr yus mkh pytthh yivan avs) tvhụ̄ ạsiv yczhan zi kmzvr dvr gvczuhv tohyih mylun mgr Allah tʿālyā sund aradh avs yih zi pnnyv arshadav sintụ̄ havihe ḥqs ḥq bnạvith, th kạfrn czatthi he mvul.
Takh ḥq rvzihe ḥq bnith th bạṭl rvzhe baṭl bnith, khvah mujrimn yih kvtah thi nagvar gczhụ̄ tn.
Byyhi suh mvqʿ yylhi tvhụ̄ pnnis rbs fryad ạsiv kran, drjvab frmvv tmụ̄ zi bh svz tuhndi mdd khạṭr pyvtths pytth akh sas frshth.

Yih kth vnụ̄nav khudayn tohyih ṣrf amhi mvjvb zi tohyih spdyv khvsh khbr, th tuhndụ̄ dil spdan aamhi sintụ̄ mṭmʿn, nath yylhi thi mdd spdan chuh, suh chuh Allah tʿālyā sndy ṭrfh spdan, pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh Allah tʿālyā zbrdst th ḥkmt vvl.

Byyhi suh vqt yylhi Allah tʿālyā pnnhi ṭrfh ghnvdgy hnzi shklhi mnz tohyih pytth aiṭmynan th be khvfy hnz kyfyt ṭạry avs kran. (yohe tjrbh avs muslmann jngi auḥds mnz pysh āmut, yithh pạtthụ̄ zn svrh āli ʿmran āyt 154 has mnz frmavnh chuh āmut) th āsmanh pytthh avs tohyih pytth āb travan takh tohyih krihyv pak th tohyih nishhi krihe shyṭan snz travnh āmcz napạky dvur, th tuhndụ̄ dl krihe mẓbvṭ th amhi dhryʿh dr ravihe tuhndụ̄ qdm.

Byyhi suh vqt yylhi tuhund rb frshtn avs aisharh kran zi, bh chuhs tohyih sintụ̄, tvhụ̄ thạviyvukh ahli ayman thạbt qdm, bh trav yimn kạfrn hndyn diln mnz byim, lhādha lgạviv tvhụ̄ tihnzn grdnn pytth ẓrb th prth tans pytth chvtt. (jngi bdrkụ̄ yim vaqʿāt yvt tam akhi akhi yad pavnh chih āmtụ̄ aamhi nishhi chuh mqṣd draṣl lfẓ aanfal hch mʿnvyt vaẓḥ krnụ̄. Abtda hs mnz avs arshad spudmut zi tvhụ̄ kth chihv mali ghnymts pnnhi janfshạny hund phl smjhith aamikụ̄ mạlk th mkhtar bnan. Yih chuh draṣl Allah tʿālyā sund ʿṭyih th muʿṭiy (ʿṭyh dnh vvl) chuh khod pnnhi maluk panh mkhtar. Vonụ̄ chih amhi kis thbvts mnz yim vaqʿāt gnzravnh āmtụ̄ zi ath kamyạby mnz lgạvitav pane ḥsab th vuchihtav zi tuhnzi janfshạny, juratuk th jsartuk kvtah ḥṣh avs, th Allah tʿālyā sndi ʿnaytuk kvtah ḥṣh avs. Amhi mvjvb aamiyuk fạṣlh krun zi yih kithh pạtthụ̄ gczihh bạgravnh yun chahnh tuhnz kạm blkh chhe Allah tʿālyā snz kạm)
Yih chuh amhi mvjvb zi timv kvr khudays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvls sintụ̄ mqablh th yus khudays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvls sintụ̄ mqablh kri, Allah tʿālyā chuh tmụ̄ sndi khạṭr sytthah skht gyr.
Yih chuh tohyih lukn hund sza (mkhạṭb chih kufari qrysh, yimn bdrs mnz shkst myvul) vonụ̄ vuchihv aamiyuk mzh, th tohyih gczhyv fikri tarun zi ḥqs ankar krn valyn khạṭr chuh jhnmuk ʿdhab.
Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, yylhi tohyih akis lashkr kis ṣvurts mnz kufarn sintụ̄ buthụ̄ lage spdi tylhi pihrzyv nh tihndis mqabls mnz shanh (yʿny yvt phyirzyv nh)

Yymụ̄ aath mvqʿs pytth shanh pihrụ̄, aila yih zi jngy chalhi rngụ̄ kri ya kri kạnshi dvyimis fvjs sintụ̄ ralnh mvjvb, nath yiyhi suh Allah tʿālyā sndis ghẓbs mnz hynh, tmụ̄sund tthkanh āshi jhnm, th so chhe sytthhe nakarh vapsy hnz jae.

Lhādha chhe ḥqyqt yih zi tohyih kriyvukh nh tim qtl, blkh krụ̄ tim khudayn qtl. Th ae nby, tohyih chhvkvnh blkh chhvk khdayn. (bdrkis mʿrks mnz yylhi mslmann th kạfrn hndụ̄ lshkr akh akis brvntth kun āe th pth vvt aathh milvanuk mvqʿ, ḥẓvr chih pnnis dsti mbarks mnz akh sykhi motth tulan th pth chih shahati alvjuvh vanan vnan so kufarn kun chhkan th yih frmavns sinty chih mslman ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hndis aishars pytth ykbar kufarn pytth ḥmlh kran. Yih chuh athụ̄ vaqʿs kun asharh. Mṭlb chuh yih zi dsti mbark avs ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hund mgr ẓrb avs Allah tʿālyā sndi ṭrfh, th mvmnn hndụ̄ athh yim ath kamhi mnz astʿmal āe krnh) avs amhi mvjvb zi Allah tʿālyā tarihe mvmnn akhi bhtryn āzmạyshhi sintụ̄ kamyạby san aapvr, pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh Allah tʿālyā bvzn vvl th zann vvl.
Yih mʿāmlh chuh tohyih sintụ̄, th kafrn sintụ̄ chuh mʿāmlh yih zi Allah tʿālyā chuh tihnzn chaln kmzvr krn vvl.

(yimn kạfrn vniv), agr tvhụ̄ fạṣlh ạsiv yczhan, rttiv tylhi vvt fạṣlhi tohyih brvnhh kun. (mkh pytthh rvanh spdnh vizi avs mushrikv kʿbkụ̄ prdh rttith duʿā mvngmut zi khudaya, doyv daryv mnz yus bhtr chuh ts kr ftḥ ʿṭa) vonụ̄ phyiriv baz tuhndy khạṭr chuh bhtr. Nath agr yvt phyirith soe ghlṭy kriv tylhi krv asụ̄ thi tamy szahuk aiʿādh, th tuhnz jmʿīt khvah so kạczah thi zyadh āshi yiyav nh tohyih bkar, Allah tʿālyā chuh mvmnn sintụ̄.
Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, Allah tʿālyā snz th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl snz kriv aṭaʿt th ḥkm bvznh pth mah pihrv tmhi nishhi buth.
Timn lukn hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄ mah bniv, yimv vvn zi ashi bvuz ḥalankh tim chihnh bvzan.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chih khudays nzdyk bdtryn qsmkụ̄ janvr tim zrụ̄ th klụ̄ yim ʿqlhi chihnh kạm hyvan.
Agr khudays pe āshi he zi yimn mnz chuh rczh thi rczr tylhi diyih he suh timn bvznuk tvfyq, (mgr rczr vrạe) agr suh timn bvznavi he tylhi pihrhan tim be rukhy san buth.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, Allah tʿālyā th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl sndis ālvas pytth vniv lbyk yylhi zan rsvl tohyih tth chyzs kun bulavi yus tohyih zndgy bkhshn vvl chuh, byyhi thạviv zạnith zi Allah tʿālyā chuh ansans th tmụ̄ sndis dils drmyan ḥạyl th tsụ̄ kun yiyiv tvhụ̄ (rvzi mḥshrs mnz) vttith ninh.

Byyhi bchiv tmhi fitnh nishhi yymich shhmt mkhṣvṣ pạtthụ̄ timne lukn tam mḥdvud rvzi nh yimav tohyih mnz gnah āshi kvrmut. (aamhi nishhi chuh murad tim ajtmạʿī fitnh yim ʿām vabahkụ̄ pạtthụ̄ ticzh shhmt chih aanan yth mnz ṣrf gnah krn vạly yạtụ̄ chihnh grftar spdan blkh chih tim lukh thi marh gczhan yimav gnah gar svsaʿtty mnz rvzun āshi brdasht kvrmut) th zạnith thạviv, Allah tʿālyā chuh skht sza dinh vvl.

Yad kriv suh vqt yylhi tvhụ̄ kme ạsiv, zmyns mnz ạsiv tvhụ̄ kmzvr yivan smjhnh, tvhụ̄ ạsiv khoczan rvzan zi khbr lukh ma mittavanv tohyih, pth krnv tohyih khudayn chahpn jae dstyab, pnnhi mdd sintụ̄ krin tuhndụ̄ athh mẓbvṭ th tohyih vatnvvnav jan rziq, shayd zi tvhụ̄ bniv shukr gzar.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, mah kriv khudays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms sintụ̄ khyant, pnnyn amantn mnz mah kriv zạnith mạnith ghdạry hund aatur. (pnnyn amantn nishh chuh murad timh sare dhmh dạriyih yim kạnshi pytth aʿtmad krith tas ḥvalh yin krnh, khvah timh ʿhdi vfa chih dhmh dạriyih āsn ya ajtmạʿī mʿāhdn hnz, ya āsn jmaʿt kyn razn hnz, ya shkhṣy th jmaʿty maln hnzi, ya kunhi ʿhdh th mnṣb chhi, yimh jmaʿt kạnshi shkhṣs pytth bhrvsh krith ḥvalh kri)
Th zạnith rvuziv zi tuhndụ̄ mal th tuhndụ̄ avlad chih drḥqyqt āzmạyshhi hndụ̄ saman th khudays nishhi chuh aajr dinh khạṭr varyah kynhh.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, agr tvhụ̄ tqvāy akhtyar kriv, tylhi thavi Allah tʿālyā tuhndi khạṭr khvtt bhm. (khvtt chih tth chyzs vnan yosh aṣlch th khottich frq chhe nnụ̄ krran. Yohe mfhvm chuh frqanuk thi, avae chuh aashi frqan lfẓuk trjmh khvtt kvrmut. Arshadi alhāy huk manshhi chuh yih zi agr khudays khvczụ̄ khvczụ̄ dunyahs mnz kạm kriv tylhi kri khudae tohyih mnz frq krnuk suh ṭaqt pạd, yiyimhi sintụ̄ qdms qdms pytth tohyih pạnụ̄ pane yih pe lghi zi kus hyvu rviyih chuh ṣḥyḥ th kus chuh ghlṭ, kosh hish vath chhe ḥq yosh khudays kun chhe gczhan th kosh vath chhe bạṭl yosh shyṭans sintụ̄ chhe rlavan) th tuhnz burạyyih kri tohyih nishhi dvur th tuhndụ̄ qṣvr kari mʿāf, Allah tʿālyā chuh bvdd fẓl krn vvl.

Suh vqt thi chuh yad pavns qạbl, yylhi mnkryni ḥq tohyih khlaf tdbyr ạsụ̄ svnchan zi tohyih krhanav qạd ya krhanav qtl, nath krrhanv vṭnh mnz (yih chhe tmhi mvqʿch dhkr yylhi qryshn hund yih andyshhi yqyn kis ḥds tam avs vvtmut zi vvnụ̄ gczhn Muḥammad thi mdynh. Tmhi saʿth lgụ̄ tim panh vạnụ̄ vannhi zi agr yih shkhṣ mkh mnz drav tylhi czlhi khṭrh sanhi qabv nishhi nybr. Chnanchhi timv kvr ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn mtʿlq ạkhry fạṣlh krnh mokhh akh ajtmaʿ th ath kthhi pytth kvrukh panh vạnụ̄ mshvrh zi amhi khṭruk sdi bab kithh pạtthụ̄ yiyhi krnh) tim ạsụ̄ pnnhi chalh gindan th Allah tʿālyā avs pnnụ̄ chal gndan th Allah tʿālyā chuh sarine hndi khoth bhtr chal gindn vvl.
Yylhi timn ạsụ̄ sạnụ̄ āyat bvznavnh yivan, tim ạsụ̄ vnan zi, ā, bvuz aashi, hrgah yczhv asụ̄ thi hykv yiczhe kthh bnạvith, yimh chhe time pranh dlylh yimh lukh chih godd pytthe vnan pkan.
Th so kth thi chhe yad yosh timv vnmcz ạs zi, khudaya agr yih vaqʿī ḥq chuh chanhi ṭrfh, tylhi val aashi pytth āsmanh pytthh knhi, nath aan kanhh dg tulvun ʿdhab aashi pytth.
Tmhi vqth avsnh Allah tʿālyā timn pytth ʿdhab nạzil krn vvl yylhi tvhụ̄ timn drmyan ạsiv, th byyhi chuhnh Allah tʿālyā sund yih qạʿdh zi lukh āsn astghfar kran th suh diyih timn ʿdhab.

Mgr vonụ̄ kyazi kri nh suh timn pytth ʿdhab nạzil, yylhi zn tim msjdi ḥramch vath chih rukavan, ḥalankh tim chihnh amhi msjdi hndụ̄ jạyz mutvlụ̄ kynhh, aamikụ̄ jạyz mutvlụ̄ hykn ṣrf ahl tqvyā he ạsith, mgr akthr chihnh aath kthhi zanan.

Byt Allah hs nkhh kosh nmaz chhe yimn lukn spdan? Bs chih shurinhi kran th aathh vayan, lhādha rttiv vonụ̄ tamhi ʿdhabuk mzh vuchihv pnnis tth ankari ḥq kis padashs mnz yus tvhụ̄ kran chihv rvudimtụ̄.

Yimv lukv ḥq mannh nishhi ankar chuh kvrmut, tim chih pnnụ̄ mal Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi nishhi rukavnh mokhh khrch kran, th vunhi rvzn byyhi khrch kran, mgr ạkhr kar bnn yime kvushshhi tihndi khạṭr pchhtavnuk sbb, pth gczhn tim mghlvb, pth yin yim kạfr jhnms kun ghyr krith aannh.
Takh Allah tʿālyā kri gndgy, pạkyzgy nishhi chhạnttith byvn, th prth qsmch gndgy rlạvith krys kunue, pth chhkhi tth phttjhi jhnms, yime lukh chih aṣly khsarh ld.

Ae nby, yimn kạfrn vniv zi agr vunhi thi baz phyrn tylhi yikynczhah pth kun spudmut chuh suh yiyhi drgzr krnh, albth agr yim tamy ptimhi rvishhi hund aʿādh krn tylhi yikynczhah ptimyn qvmn sintụ̄ spudmut chuh suh chuh sarine pe.

(ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut) yimn kạfrn sintụ̄ kriv jng yvt tam fitnh gczihh khtm th dyn spdi pvur pạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā sndi khạṭr, pth agr tim ftnh nishhi baz phyrn, tylhi chuh tihndyn aʿmaln hund vuchhn vvl Allah tʿālyā.
Th agr tim mann nh tylhi rvuziv zạsith zi Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhund rchhn vvl th suh chuh bhtryn ḥạmy th mddgar.

Th tohyih gczihh pe lgnụ̄ zi yus mali ghnymt tohyih ḥạṣl chuhv kvr mut (yth jayih chuh tamhi mali ghnymt kh bạgravnuk qanvn vannh yivan yth mtʿlq tqryr kis abtdahs mnz vannh avs āmut zi yih chuh Allah tʿālyā sund anʿām yth mtʿlq fạṣlh krnuk akhtyar Allah tʿālyā th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl se yvt chuh, vonụ̄ āv suh fạṣlh byan krnh) tamiyuk pvunczim ḥṣh chuh khdays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms khạṭr byyhi rshth darn, ytymn, mskynn th msafrn khạṭr agr tohyih ayman avnmut chuhv khudays pytth th tth chyzs pytth yus fạṣlh kh doh, yʿny doshvnụ̄ fvjn hndi ttkravnh kh doh ashi pnnis bnds pytth nạzil avs kvrmut, (yʿny suh tạʿyd th nṣrt yymhi kh bdvlth tohyih ftḥ ḥạṣl spzv, th yymhi kh bdvlte tohyih yih mali ghnymt ḥạṣl spduv, tylhi kriv yih ḥṣh khvshy san ada) Allah tʿālyā chuh prth chyzs pytth qdrt thavan.

Yad kriv suh vqt yylhi tvhụ̄ vady hndi yymhi ṭrfh ạsiv th tim ạsụ̄ dvyimhi ṭrfh prrav trạvith th fạṣlh avs tohyih bnụ̄ kinụ̄ (sạḥils) kun agr tohyih th timn drmyan godde mqablch qrar dad spdymcz āsihe, tylhi krihiv tvhụ̄ ẓrvur tth mvqʿs pytth ajtnab, albth yikynczhah pysh āv suh avs amhi mvjvb zi yymhi kthhi hund fạṣlh khudayn kvrmut avs tth kddi nvn, takh yas hlak chuh spdun, suh gczhhi ttakar dlylhi san hlak, th yas zndh chuh rvzun, suh rvzi ttakar dlylhi san zndh, yqynaan chuh Allah tʿālyā bvzn vvl th zann vvl.

Ae nby, th yad kriv suh vqt, yylhi Allah tʿālyā avs timn tuhndis khvabs mnz kme havan. (yih chhe tmhi vqtch kth yylhi ḥẓvr muslman hyth mdynh pytthh nyran ạsụ̄ ya vathi ạsụ̄ kunhi jayih, th yih ạs nh pe zi kạfrn hund lshkr kvtah bvdd chuh. Tamhi vqth vuchh ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmv khvabs mnz yih lshkr, th yus mnẓr timn brvnhh knhi pysh āv krnh tmhi nishhi kvr timv andazh zi dshmnn hund tʿdad chuhnh zyadh kynhh) hrgah suh tohyih tihund tʿdad zyadh havihe. Tylhi hạrihiv ẓrvr tvhụ̄ hmt th lrrayih hndis mʿāmls mnz tulhi hiv tnazʿh, mgr khudae ne bchạvinv tvhụ̄ amhi nishhi, pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh suh syinan hund ḥal tam zanan.

Th yad kriv yylhi mqablh kh vqth khudayn tohyih lukn hnzn nẓrn mnz dushmn kme hạvụ̄ th tihnzn nẓrn mnz krinv tvhụ̄ km krith pysh, takh yosh kth spdn vajinụ̄ ạs tth krri Allah tʿālyā nvn, th ạkhrkar chih sạry mʿāmlat Allah tʿālyā se kun rjvʿ spdan.
Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, yylhi kunhi dris sintụ̄ tuhund mqablh spdi tylhi rvuziv thạbt qdm, byyhi kriyvun Allah tʿālyā kthrt san yad, tvqʿ chuh zi tohyih spdyv kamyạby nṣyb.

Byyhi kriv Allah tʿālyā snz th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl snz aṭaʿt th panh vạnụ̄ mah tuliv tnazʿh tylhi gczihh tohyih mnz kmzvury pạd, th tohyih vsyv phokhe th ṣbrs hyyiv kạm. (yʿny pnnụ̄ jdhbat th khvạhshat thạviv gnddas mnz. Jld bạzy, ghbrahtt, khvf, ṭmʿ th namnạsb jvshhi nishhi bchiv. Tthndd dlh san th svnchnh smjhnh āmthi fạṣlh san kriv kạm.
